name: Arcane Marshal
description: A tactical leader who blends arcane might with battlefield command.
starting_equipment: a martial weapon and a shield or two simple weapons
a scholar's pack or diplomat's pack

features.name: Arcane Orders
features.description: You learn 2 cantrips from the wizard spell list and 1 1st-level spell. You can cast spells using Intelligence.

features.name: Commander's Rally
features.description: You can use a bonus action to grant an ally within 30 ft a reaction to move or make an attack.
